Html:
hi

so Is this library able to crop an mp3 file for me?

lets say I have a song file and I want to extract the sound from 1:00 to 2:00..

is that achievable? if so how to do that?

 

thanks in advanced..
yes, so long as you understand a bit about how MP3 files are structured. See my answer to this question on StackOverflow

thank you for the answer.. but how many MP3Frame(s) are required to produce lets say 1 second??

or how can I calculate this? any specific method?

or what's the length of every MP3Frames (in milliseconds)..
